Active Projects: Call the GRM hotline to submit your grievance by phone
Miradi Hai: Piga simu ya msaada wa GRM kuwasilisha malalamiko yako kwa simu

Active Projects: Choose a method to file your complaint
Miradi Hai: Chagua njia ya kuwasilisha malalamiko yako

Active Projects: Complaint not found. Please check the tracking code.
Miradi Hai: Malalamiko hayakupatikana. Tafadhali angalia nambari ya ufuatiliaji.

Active Projects: Contact a field officer who can register your complaint on your behalf
Miradi Hai: Wasiliana na afisa wa uwandani ambaye anaweza kusajili malalamiko yako kwa niaba yako

Active Projects: Enter your tracking code to check the status
Miradi Hai: Ingiza nambari yako ya ufuatiliaji kuangalia hali

Active Projects: File your grievance via web, mobile, or field officer
Miradi Hai: Wasilisha malalamiko yako kupitia wavuti, simu, au afisa wa uwandani

Active Projects: Get a tracking code and monitor progress
Miradi Hai: Pata nambari ya ufuatiliaji na ufuatilie maendeleo

Active Projects: Public reports will appear here once generated.
Miradi Hai: Ripoti za umma zitaonekana hapa baada ya kutengenezwa.

Active Projects: Submit through the GRM mobile application available on Android
Miradi Hai: Wasilisha kupitia programu ya simu ya GRM inayopatikana kwenye Android

Active Projects: Visit the nearest GRM office to submit your complaint in person
Miradi Hai: Tembelea ofisi ya GRM iliyo karibu nawe kuwasilisha malalamiko yako ana kwa ana

Active Projects: We are here to help. Track complaints, view statistics, and submit new grievances easily.
Miradi Hai: Tuko hapa kukusaidia. Fuatilia malalamiko, angalia takwimu, na wasilisha malalamiko mapya kwa urahisi.

Active Projects: Web form coming soon. For now, please use one of the methods above.
Miradi Hai: Fomu ya wavuti inakuja hivi karibuni. Kwa sasa, tafadhali tumia mojawapo ya njia hapo juu.
